# cloudtemple_object_storage_buckets (Data Source)

Used to retrieve all buckets in the object storage.

To query this datasource you will need the `object-storage_read` role.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "cloudtemple_object_storage_buckets" "example" {}

output "all_buckets" {
  value = data.cloudtemple_object_storage_buckets.example.buckets
}

output "bucket_count" {
  value = length(data.cloudtemple_object_storage_buckets.example.buckets)
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `buckets` (List of Object) The list of buckets. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--buckets))
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.

<a id="nestedatt--buckets"></a>
### Nested Schema for `buckets`

Read-Only:

- `endpoint` (String)
- `id` (String)
- `name` (String)
- `namespace` (String)
- `retention_period` (Number)
- `total_objects` (Number)
- `total_objects_deleted` (String)
- `total_size` (String)
- `total_size_deleted` (String)
- `total_size_unit` (String)
- `versioning` (String)
